DOC.brief_title: The Effects Sensory Training On Pain Modulation , Cognition Time Fatigue Healthy Adults
DOC.criteria: Able provide inform consent participate study Able perform physical activity cycle 1840 year old BMI < 27 Practice moderate intensity aerobic physical activity le 150 minute per week Hypertension Diabetes Cardiovascular disease Subjects pacemaker , and/or implantable cardioverterdefibrillators History asthma active symptomatology past year , pulmonary disease use inhaler Physical disability , neurological and/or psychological disorder precludes safe adequate test Conditions may impair ability feel pain Mental impairment limit ability cooperate Uncorrected medical condition , significant anemia , important electrolyte imbalance , hyperthyroidism Pregnancy try become pregnant next 6 month History alcohol drug abuse within past 6 month selfreported Epilepsy Suffering severe depression ( score > 30 Beck Depression Inventory ) History unexplained fainting spell selfreported Head injury result momentary loss consciousness History neurosurgery selfreported Use antiepileptic and/or hypnotic medication like carbamazepine , valproate acid , gabapentin , zolpidem , etc . Use medication potential cardiovascular influence Active smoker , history smoking last 6 month Skin lesion open wound around area electrode application Tattoos upper limb along nerve tract
